bonzai.api

Interface Tile


  • public interface Tile
    Tiles are the building block of the map. At most one entity can occupy a tile.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Tile.State
      The possible terrain types for a tile.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDuckCross() 
      boolean canFarmhandCross() 
      Duck getDuck() 
      Entity getEntity() 
      Farmhand getFarmhand() 
      Item getItem() 
      Position getPosition()
      Gets the location of the tile and returns it.
      Tile.State getTileState()
      Returns the terrain type of tile this is.
      int getX()
      Gets the X location of the tile and returns it.
      int getY()
      Gets the Y location of the tile and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        int getX()
        Gets the X location of the tile and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        int the X location of the tile if visible, otherwise -1.

      • getY

        int getY()
        Gets the Y location of the tile and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        int the Y location of the tile if visible, otherwise -1.

      • getPosition

        Position getPosition()
        Gets the location of the tile and returns it. The topleft corner of the screen is marked as (0, 0).
        Returns:
        Position the location of the tile if visible, otherwise null.

      • getTileState

        Tile.State getTileState()
        Returns the terrain type of tile this is.
        Returns:
        Tile.State the tile terrain type

      • canFarmhandCross

        boolean canFarmhandCross()
        Returns:
        true if a farmhand can cross the current terrain type, otherwise false; this takes in to account the exclusion zone around enemy bases and will correctly respond that those tiles are impassable

      • canDuckCross

        boolean canDuckCross()
        Returns:
        true if a duck can cross the current terrain type, otherwise false

      • getEntity

        Entity getEntity()
        Returns:
        the entity occupying the tile; null if nothing is occupying the tile. If a Farmhand occupying the tile is carrying another Entity, this method will return the farmhand.

      • getFarmhand

        Farmhand getFarmhand()
        Returns:
        the farmhand on the tile, or null if none found

      • getDuck

        Duck getDuck()
        Returns:
        the duck on the tile, or null if none found

      • getItem

        Item getItem()
        Returns:
        the item on the tile, or null if none found
